review: Update: After numerous times of reset/restore, the stick is now functioning, still intermittent connection issues, but at least working.So I would give it a 3 star instead of 1.A couple of annoying things:  It often hijack the TV without me choosing the HDMI portal. I turn off TV on cable (connected to my HDMI 1) or on apple TV (HDMI 3) then later I turn TV back on, it is on amazon fire stick (HDMI 2), tried swapping HDMI hubs, still hijacking it.===========================================================================================================================================Since I got it, I had trouble with wifi connection.It can connect with my wireless but with problems. I had apple TV, fireTV stick both connected. FireTV kept getting connection problems.Stream stops seconds after playing. Can't watch at all.Try restart router, restart fire TV, reset everything. Didn't work. While apple TV at the same time had no problem streaming.

review: I THINK IT IS NOT WORTH BUYING ANY AMAZON FIRE PRODUCT (Cell phone, Tablet, Fire stick etc). Better go for 100% android products. Not at all better compared to Chromecast. Having lot of buffering issues. Not many apps. Wireless keeps dropping the internet. Keeps getting "Error Occurred". While navigating it jumps from one row to other row. Not sure why we need to plugin power all the time. Want to return it. Specs are not correct I think. Hope Amazon will provide a update fix. The support web site does not provide any help with the issues I am having. If any customer support person can help fixing this problem that will be great. I have Roku, Playstation, WIFI smart TV and other Android devices and all of them work perfectly fine... except this Amazon Fire Stick. I really would like return it, but I hate to return.
author: Manu

review: Really slick device.  I've had issues with my Google Chromecast and buffering.  I haven't had any problems with the Fire Stick.  I've been playing movies through Amazon Prime and Netflix and made it through all movies without a single buffering issue.  I am also using the stick about 30 feet away from my WIFI.  The only issue is lack of additional apps, but I think time will bring in more app support.  It doesn't support casting from a device like the Chromecast, but I think the rock steady playback is an excellent trade off.
